SELECT id, CONCAT(NAME, ' ', phone) text FROM pub_driver where 1=1
and CONCAT(NAME, ' ', phone) like "%"#{driver}"%"
ORDER BY CONCAT(NAME, ' ', phone)

select * from (select id, if(isnull(nickname) || nickname = '', account, concat(nickname, " ", account)) text from pe_user where status = 1 UNION ALL select id, if(isnull(nickname) || nickname = '', account, concat(nickname, " ", account)) text from org_user where status = 1) aa where 1 = 1
and aa.text like "%"#{passengers}"%"
ORDER BY aa.text

select id , fullname text from org_organ where 1=1 and status = '1'
and fullname like "%"#{organid}"%"
ORDER BY fullname
